snippet: After their summer concert in Central Park was canceled because of a storm, the Black Eyed Peas tried again, and this time rapped cheerfully in the rain.
lead_paragraph: After their summer concert in Central Park was canceled because of a storm, the Black Eyed Peas tried again, and this time rapped cheerfully in the rain.

headline.main: Rapping in the Rain, All Smiles
headline.print_headline: Rapping in the Rain, All Smiles
headline.seo: Black Eyed Peas Play Central Park Benefit Concert - Review
